        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2685</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">seasonal changes on the surface of the globe.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saisonänderungen auf der Oberfläche der Kugel.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changements saisonniers sur la surface du globe.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudanças seasonal na superfície do globo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamenti stagionali sulla superficie del globo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εποχιακές αλλαγές στην επιφάνεια της σφαίρας.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cambios estacionales en la superficie del globo.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation of the revolving globe showing the seasonal changes on the earths surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">meteorology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">seasons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation der rotierenden Kugel, welche die 
Saisonänderungen auf der Masse zeigt, tauchen auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation du globe de rotation montrant les 
changements saisonniers sur les terres apprêtent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation do globo revolvendo que mostra as mudanças 
seasonal nas terras aplaina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione del globo di giro che mostra i cambiamenti 
stagionali sulle terre emerge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα της σφαίρας που εμφανίζει εποχιακές 
αλλαγές στη γήινη επιφάνεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación del globo que gira que muestra los cambios 
estacionales en las tierras emerge.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
